channel.title: Lubridate on Curso-R
channel.description: Recent content in Lubridate on Curso-R

item.title: Introdução
item.description: Lubridate O pacote lubridate faz o trabalho com datas ser muito mais fácil. Ela foi criada por Garrett Grolemund e Hadley Wickham. library(lubridate) ## Loading required package: methods ## ## Attaching package: 'lubridate' ## The following object is masked from 'package:base': ## ## date library(magrittr) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:lubridate': ## ## intersect, setdiff, union ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union Resumo do que aprenderemos:
